channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Barriers and a bollard on side of Cranham Road., 30th April
item.description:
They have been there for a considerable amount of time. Says WW Utilities on the yellow barriers.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Sydenham Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Corsa on road, 30th April
item.description:
This car has been abandoned here for over six months. It has multiple flat tires, mould and trash inside the car and a big dent at the rear. It is parked right by the entrance to the apartments on Kings Road, just behind the white line, on the left hand side of the road when coming from Hales Road direction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 King's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes, 30th April
item.description:
Been here for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedges over growing pavement, 29th April
item.description:
The footpath along this edge of the Park (near Cornerways) is be encroached upon by overgrown vegetation. Please could it be cut back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7a The Park, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potential sink hole, 28th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 165 Alstone Lane, Cheltenham
